item.title: Adobe integrates generative AI directly into Photoshop with new Firefly capabilities
item.description: Experience the future of Photoshop with Generative Fill https://helpx.adobe.com/ie/photoshop/using/generative-fill.html Generative AI with Firefly https://www.adobe.com/sensei/generative-ai/firefly.html YouTube Adobes New AI ‘FIREFLY Photoshop’ Has Everyone Stunned! This new Photoshop tool will CHANGE PHOTOGRAPHY FOREVER
